title: Software Developer
description:
I develop a .NET based procurement web app and an Apache Karaf based integration platform. 

Additionally, I provide support for and develop two customer application management systems dealing with manufacturing and reporting, respectively.

title: Youth Councelor

title: Customer Service Agent
